title: 2007 Hun Sen Cup
text:
Hun Sen Cup is the main football knockout tournament in Cambodia.The 2007 Hun Sen Cup was the 1st season of the Hun Sen Cup, the premier knockout tournament for association football clubs in Cambodia involving Cambodian League and provincial teams organized by the Football Federation of Cambodia.


== Group stage ==
There were 28 participants from Cambodian League and other provinces.

Fair Play: Build Bright University
